author: fielding
msg: Added a <LimitExcept method ...> sectioning directive that allows
the user to assign authentication control to any HTTP method that
is *not* given in the argument list; i.e., the logical negation
of the <Limit> directive.  This is particularly useful for controlling
access on methods unknown to the Apache core, but perhaps known by
some module or CGI script.
Submitted by:	 Roy Fielding and Tony Finch <dot@dotat.at>

author: fielding
msg: Update the other two Win32 Makefiles for the htpasswd change.

author: fielding
msg: Prevent apachectl from complaining if the PIDFILE exists but
does not contain a process id, as might occur if the server is
being rapidly restarted.
Submitted by:	Wilfredo Sanchez <wsanchez@apple.com>
Reviewed by:	Roy Fielding, Jim Jagielski
